Body: I've just built android source using make full_x86-eng. It does not give any compilation error, but Android emulator runs without Internet connection. If I run emulator with default images, all works fine. And I use direct connection without proxy. Any ideas?netstat -rn                                         Proto Recv-Q Send-Q Local Address          Foreign Address        State tcp       0      0 127.0.0.1:5037         0.0.0.0:*              LISTEN tcp       0      0 0.0.0.0:5555           0.0.0.0:*              LISTEN tcp       0     95 10.0.2.15:5555         10.0.2.2:58532         ESTABLISHEDnetcfgeth0     UP                                   10.0.2.15/24  0x00001043 52:54:00:12:34:56    sit0     DOWN                                   0.0.0.0/0   0x00000080 00:00:00:00:00:00    lo       UP                                   127.0.0.1/8   0x00000049 00:00:00:00:00:00ping 10.0.2.2                                        connect: Network is unreachable
Title: No internet after building from source

history.Text: I've just built android source using *make full_x86-eng*. It does not give any compilation error, but Android emulator runs without Internet connection. If I run emulator with default images, all works fine. And I use direct connection without proxy. Any ideas?    netstat -rn                                             Proto Recv-Q Send-Q Local Address          Foreign Address        State     tcp       0      0 127.0.0.1:5037         0.0.0.0:*              LISTEN     tcp       0      0 0.0.0.0:5555           0.0.0.0:*              LISTEN     tcp       0     95 10.0.2.15:5555         10.0.2.2:58532         ESTABLISHED    netcfg        eth0     UP                                   10.0.2.15/24  0x00001043 52:54:00:12:34:56        sit0     DOWN                                   0.0.0.0/0   0x00000080 00:00:00:00:00:00        lo       UP                                   127.0.0.1/8   0x00000049 00:00:00:00:00:00    ping 10.0.2.2                                            connect: Network is unreachable
No internet after building from source
